name: Rescue Bear Operation
description: Rescue Bear Operation is: a one-level, all ages, child friendly, free to play, mini game designed to create awareness about wildfires. We'll be donating at least 30% of our net proceeds to charitable causes.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 10 or greater GPU DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 250 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 11 or greater GPU DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 250 MB available space
